Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 18th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/6/2015...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2015, going 6-0, 1.47...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Traded from Atlanta to New York on 6/10/2018 (Going to NY: P Timothy Egerton. Going to ATL: P Benjamin Haupt, P Jame Meany, P Joseph Hedgepeth, P Phillip Reed)...
Had first career hit on 6/15/2018, off Jose Mejia (KC)...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/9/2018 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
8/9/2018: Signed a contract extension with New York , $14,550,000 per year, for 4 years.
